game: "N Puzzles" (players 1) (equipment { (board (square <Version:boardSize>)) <Version:pieces> }) (rules (start (place Random {<Version:random>})) (play (forEach Piece)) (end (if (is Target {<Version:order>}) (result P1 Win) ) ) )
metadata: (info { (description "N puzzles are played with tiles within a grid, with one empty space. For instance, in a 4x4 grid there are 15 tiles.") (rules "The tiles are each given a number from 1 to n-1. By sliding the tiles into the open space, the object is to placed the tiles in order based on their numbering.")
